February, 22nd, 2007 
 
Ovalcom Inc 
Nabeel Khalid, Owner 
legal@ovalcom.com 
+923004918365 
381-2-C1, Township 
Lahore, Pakistan, 54770 
 
Demand to ISP Under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act 
 
ThePlanet, Inc 
C/O Copyright Agent for Notice of Claims of Copyright Infringement 
http://www.insidethesports.com/ hosted on IP: 67.18.160.106 
 
Dear ThePlanet, Inc. 
 
I, Nabeel Khalid owner of Ovalcom Inc, certify under penalty of   
perjury, that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner   
of certain intellectual property rights. 
 
I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below   
are not authorized by law for use by the above named domain name owner

or their agents and therefore infringes the copyright owner's rights.   
I have attempted to resolve this directly with the account holder   
without satisfaction. I hereby demand that you act expeditiously to   
remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be   
infringing and take other appropriate action against the account   
holder to prevent future infringement. 
Our Copyright Statement can be found at:
http://www.ovalcom.com/copyright.htm 
 
My contact information is as follows: 
 
Ovalcom Inc 
Nabeel Khalid, CEO 
contact@pawas.com 
+923004918365 
381-2-C1, Township 
Lahore, Pakistan, 54770 
 
 
Allegedly Infringing items or materials: 
The Site owner has duplicated more than 400 pages from our Network
Websites. 
 
Infringing material that I demand be disabled or removed in
